remarks:
Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number.  Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.) 

---

 Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number. Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20.  Part of Definition 11.2.7(vi) of [HoTT], p.  (varies).  (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement: ltmul1 $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ ( C e. RR /\ 0 < C ) ) -> ( A < B <-> ( A x. C ) < ( B x. C ) ) ) $.
